[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Dancing Script|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#4A4850″ text_font_size=”50px” header_2_font=”Dancing Script|700|||||||” header_2_font_size=”50px” header_2_line_height=”0.5em” text_orientation=”center” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”40px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off”]

How It Works

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||50px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|||on|||||” text_text_color=”#4a4850″ text_orientation=”center”]

Step 1

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.youfloral.ca/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/browse_collections.png” alt=”Browse Collections” title_text=”Browse Collections” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” max_width=”35%”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_3_font=”Dancing Script|700|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_font_size=”28px” header_3_line_height=”1.2em” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”||30px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Browse our collections and get inspired

You can choose from one of our packages, or create your very own!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|||on|||||” text_text_color=”#4a4850″ text_orientation=”center”]

Step 2

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.youfloral.ca/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/delivery.png” alt=”Delivery” title_text=”Delivery” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”35%”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text ul_item_indent=”34px” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” link_font=”||||on||||” link_text_color=”#9A9E85″ header_3_font=”Dancing Script|700|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_font_size=”28px” header_3_line_height=”1.2em” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”||30px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Set-up delivery

We ship directly to your house, for the following locations:

  • B.C. (Lower Mainland/Greater Victoria/Greater Nanaimo/Shuswap/Kamloops/Okanagan/Larger centres in the Kootenays (i.e. Invermere/Cranbrook))
  • Alberta (greater Edmonton (includes Spruce Grove/St. Albert)/Calgary (includes Cochrane/Chestermere/Airdrie/Okotoks)
  • Saskatchewan (Saskatoon)
  • Manitoba (Winnipeg)

For dried items, we ship Canada and U.S. wide.

See our shipping rates.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|||on|||||” text_text_color=”#4a4850″ text_orientation=”center”]

Step 3

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.youfloral.ca/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/bouquet.png” alt=”Bouquet” title_text=”Bouquet” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”35%”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_3_font=”Dancing Script|700|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_font_size=”28px” header_3_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation_tablet=”” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|phone”]

DIY with some best buds

Call in your squad, pop a bottle of wine, and get ready to arrange your florals – you got this!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(244,236,225,0.9)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(244,236,225,0.9)” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://www.youfloral.ca/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/flower_delivery_vancouver.jpg” custom_padding=”80px|60px|80px|60px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px|20px|20px|20px|true|true” custom_css_main_element=”background-size: 100%;||transition: all 0.8s ease;” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_css_main_element__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” custom_css_main_element__hover=”background-size: 115%;||” custom_css_main_element_tablet=”background-size: cover;” custom_css_main_element_phone=”background-size: cover;”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”18px” text_orientation=”center” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Not sure how to make your vision come to life, or just need a bit of one-on-one attention?

We offer design consultations for $35, where you’ll chat with us and go over all the specifics like your vision, DIY advice, desired flowers, supplies, etc.

This package is perfect for those who have a pinterest board and a budget, but need some tailored advice and a recipe!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/product/design-consult/” button_text=”Book a Design Consult Now” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”16px” button_text_color=”#FAF7F2″ button_bg_color=”#9A9E85″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_radius=”5px” button_font=”|700||on|||||” button_icon=”%%3%%” button_on_hover=”off” custom_padding=”13px|45px|13px|35px|true|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_border_width__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_bg_color__hover=”#8d917a” button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
